Interface Game


  • public interface Game
    Game objects represent the state of the game, including the board, the players, the current player and the history of board states. Provide one constructor that makes a new game with the two players of the game as parameters. Initialise the board state to have four seeds in each house.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPlayer

        Player getCurrentPlayer()

      • getCurrentPlayerNum

        int getCurrentPlayerNum()

      • getCurrentBoard

        Board getCurrentBoard()

      • getResult

        int getResult()
        Returns:
        1 or 2 corresponding to the winning player, if the game is over and won. Return 0 if the game is over and it is a draw. Return a negative value if the game is not over.

      • positionRepeated

        boolean positionRepeated()
        Returns:
        true if the current board position has occurred before in the history of the game.

      • nextMove

        void nextMove()
       throws InvalidHouseException,
              InvalidMoveException
        Get a move from the current player and update the board and current player
        Throws:
        InvalidHouseException
        InvalidMoveException
